li.label: Inebriated (warm)
li.description: I just feel a bit more relaxed after that drink. That's good.

li.label: Inebriated (tipsy)
li.description: I'm a bit wobbly! And this is quite enjoyable.

li.label: Inebriated (drunk)
li.description: I feel so uninhibited and unafraid! This is a great time!

li.label: Inebriated (hammered)
li.description: I feel sick and everything is spinning. The ringing in my ears won't stop and I can't move the way I want to.

li.label: Hungover (strong)
li.description: My head hurts from all that liquor.

li.label: Hungover (pounding)
li.description: It feels like a gaggle of geese are pecking at my skull.
